This photograph depicts a serene outdoor setting featuring a natural body of water, possibly a river or a large pond, with people engaged in various activities. In the foreground, the distinct sand banks of the water body form several peninsulas into the water where people are visible. One individual is standing partially submerged near the center of the image, while another swims nearby, creating a ripple in the calm water. On a sandy spit, two people appear to be conversing, with one standing and the other seated on what seems to be a towel or a small blanket.

The background transitions into a lush green landscape, suggesting agricultural fields that contrast markedly with the arid sandy foreground. The dividing line between these environments is marked by a dense row of trees or bushes, acting as a natural barrier. In the far distance, a very flat horizon is visible showing more cultivated fields under a clear sky.

The use of color and perspective in the photograph gives a vivid sense of the outdoor environment, highlighting a recreational or leisurely setting amid a possibly rural backdrop. The overall impression is one of a peaceful retreat into nature where people engage in recreational activities away from urban settings.
title: The Colorado River shrinks to a trickle at the Mexican border. These swimmers and bathers are on the Mexican side.
